org.springframework.social.vkontakte.api

Interface FriendsOperations


  • public interface FriendsOperations
    Defines operations for interacting with a user's friends.
    Author:
    vkolodrevskiy

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<VKontakteProfile> get()
      Retrieves a list of user friends for the current authorized user.
      java.util.List<VKontakteProfile> get(java.lang.String userId)
      Retrieves a list of user friends for specified user unique identifier.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        java.util.List<VKontakteProfile> get()
        Retrieves a list of user friends for the current authorized user.
        Returns:
        a list of user friends profiles.
        Throws:
        org.springframework.social.ApiException - if there is an error while communicating with VKontakte.
        org.springframework.social.MissingAuthorizationException - if VKontakteTemplate was not created with an access token.
        VKontakteErrorException - if VKontakte returned error.

      • get

        java.util.List<VKontakteProfile> get(java.lang.String userId)
        Retrieves a list of user friends for specified user unique identifier.
        Parameters:
        userId - user unique identifier for which to get friends.
        Returns:
        a list of user friends profiles.
        Throws:
        org.springframework.social.ApiException - if there is an error while communicating with VKontakte.
        org.springframework.social.MissingAuthorizationException - if VKontakteTemplate was not created with an access token.
        VKontakteErrorException - if VKontakte returned error.
